thread.section_title: Hotel Giuliana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great choice
thread.title_full: great choice - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: suewills2015
title: great choice
text: stayed here for a few nights great location in walking distance for site seeing. very clean cant fault the hotel,staff or food. Great bar on the main road right opposite that do very nice meals. BUT as you come out of the hotel turn right if you go right again do not go up that road in the dark, its a tip from the very nice staff in the bar/resturant opposite. When we go back this is where we will stay.
